content.raw:
Is it possible that we didn't add the `pragma` before the bullet function `btScalar.h` ?   
We stop warning for the header `LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h` [here](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/src/1aa11f1bdf0b2607d7abf1c61517676854b7f3d4/deps/opende/src/step_bullet_lemke_wrapper.cpp#step_bullet_lemke_wrapper.cpp-38),   
which calls `btScalar.h`.   
It could probably be wrong, not sure whether the `pragma` could be applied recursively to the other headers called inside
content.html:
Is it possible that we didn't add the pragma before the bullet function btScalar.h ?
We stop warning for the header LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h here,
which calls btScalar.h.
It could probably be wrong, not sure whether the pragma could be applied recursively to the other headers called inside
